title: Vort-x Champion Idea
body:
Greetings to all summoners. 
I want to show you a character design for Riot called Vort-x (FAN ART). I will make avaliable the splash art image and the skill set of the champion, also a video presentation that show animations like: dance,idle state,move,return and animated splash art used in log in screen.
I hope you like, thank you and excuse my English :) .
LAN servers: I´m"Danteiba".

[Vort-x Proyect link](https://www.artstation.com/artwork/champion-concept-art-riot)

replies.body: The kit is a fair bit unbalanced but i mean the idea is cool, maybe change the passive and give him 4 abilities

maybe, but it is just an idea, Art is my strength
thank you for comment :)

to much kit.... 8 abilities with 2 flashes with a passive that turns any ability into a slow....cmon, theres just no balance there

although i really like the time you have put into the design , the neutral and altered forms were the face changes is cool as.

you're right, that's not my strength.

thank you for comment

This is awesome! I love it :D
I think what would be good though, is to make his supp form have a damaging ability... At the moment, there is no damaging spells for him in supp, which means that if you, for some reason, try and 1v1 someone and not realise your in supp mode, then all you can do is basic attack... And if your solo laning, supp form is utterly useless...
Good point thank you, im testing the idea.
This looks really cool, I almost feel half tempted to make a kit for him myself, nice work!
The champion has lore, but do not make it public because it is not my strong point, if someone wants to help, is welcome; Just let me know and I give you the information that I have.
